yes it was a typo, the will not be treated differently. 

::Dachande/Batter=
a::

l Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@...

 =
 Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 10:26 PM

a couple of other stuff)!


  Alloran here. 

  For when you come back, i g=
ot some questions: 

  When Magmatron said they'd be treated differently, o=
r was that just a typo, 
  meaning that we wouldnt be treated differently? =


  And from now on im going to forward you all my posts concerning you, to=
 avoid 
  confusion.  heres my latest Vulois post: 

  ::Vulois smiled at t=
heir responce:: 
  Vulois: Good. Magmatron controls you Cybershark?  No nee=
d to worry.  The 
  first thing we'll do is go to the Destrons.  We'll conv=
ince them of peace and 
  that you should have freedom from control of Magm=
atron at the same time.  Bu 
  tbefore we do anything in the way of peace, =
we must return to my mountain 
  lair.  I dont think this cave would be goo=
d for a base, not to mention that 
  we are dangerously close to the Allian=
ce. 
  ::He walks out of the cave and takes off flying in the direction of =
his old 
  lair, motioning them to follow him::
